data.name: Xion Leak
data.detailed_description:
Play as two newly assembled robots fleeing from Xion - a terrible, corrosive gas that destroys everything in its path. Flee before the gas fries your precious circuits! Your allies the Babybots are a bit silly but they will be of great help to you, and the mysterious Foreman will guide you through the factory he knows like the back of his hand.

Run fast, avoid the countless dangers of the factory and use the specific abilities of each of your robots to help you! Fight huge bosses, solve mechanical puzzles and find your way to freedom!

An extremely fast-paced, exciting co-op platform game for two players, with many levels, bosses and puzzles.



  • A two-player adventure with a well-oiled and sassy atmosphere
  • An infinite runner mode for one or two players
  • A nervous and very rhythmic soundtrack with drum & bass, electro, jazz tones...
  • A bit silly but very cute babybots

data.short_description: A platform game with two players in co-op, extremely nervous and fast. Play as two newly assembled robots fleeing a terrible escape from Xion; this corrosive gas that destroys everything in its path. Run away before the gas fry your precious circuits!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT730
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: intel core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX1050
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10
  • Processor: 2,7 GHz - 128 Go
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics 6100
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 12
  • Processor: 2,9 GHz - 512 Go
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics 6100
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
